mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reply WHERE b_no=#{bNo} ORDER BY days
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply VALUES (sequence_reply_no.NEXTVAL, #{bNo}, #{contents}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24/mi/ss'), #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET contents=#{contents}, WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reply WHERE no=#{no} AND id=#{id}
